TextBlock.Text: KARENIA: Ditylum, I think you might want to wait to kill that dangerous node until later.

KARENIA: I think it might be some sort of parasite on the <color=purple>Bramble</color>, although I can't be sure. I think waiting to kill it until just before putting the project into motion may put us in the <color=purple>Bramble</color>'s good graces.
DITYLUM: Okay, sounds like a plan. Once we're ready to grow the node, I'll go and kill the dangerous one, then come right back.
